name: Peanut Butter Banana Smoothie
description: Protein-packed smoothie that tastes like dessert. Perfect for breakfast or post-workout.

instructions.instruction: Blend on high 1-2 minutes until smooth.
Check consistency - add milk to thin if needed.
Pour into glasses, sprinkle cinnamon on top.
Optional: drizzle peanut butter and add banana slices on top.

tips: Frozen banana gives milkshake texture - highly recommended.
Choose peanut butter without added sugar or oil.
Add protein powder for a gym-friendly version.
Add cocoa powder for chocolate version.
servingSuggestion: Enjoy for breakfast or after workout.
variations: Add cocoa powder for chocolate version.
Add spinach for a green smoothie twist.
